name: MEGAFIGHT
description:
This was a small game I made for the cool Corridor Digital guys based on their Stop Motion Super Fight video. This was rushed in about 3 days so don't expect much. 

Some of you may notice that the sprites are just reskinned Megaman sprites. And you would be right. At the time of making this I was not a decent artist or an animator.

Corridor Digital's Video

And here they are playing the game!
